entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Flurries beginning after midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
